Comment: No clear morphological class of adjectives.
Only roots must with personal markers (prefix). The va-forms cannot be used predicatively.
Bare roots or forms with the adjectivizer/relativizer -va.
Bare roots: no. Roots with  -va: yes
Bare roots can only be placed postnominally.
The prenominal placement of a complex AP/RC is not possible independently of the linear position of the dependent.
Bare roots cannot take dependents. Only postnominal va-forms can.
